definition: tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: It's not the end of the world . Not until I say so , anyway.
sentences.chinese: 世界末日還沒到，除非是由我親口說的纔算。

sentences.english: But to me it was the end of the world, as I had known it.
sentences.chinese: 儘管我早已經知道，但這對我來說就是世界末日。

sentences.english: There are dozens of theories about how this might happen.
sentences.chinese: 有許多理論描述了世界末日是如何到來的。

sentences.english: Past doomsday prophecies have often relied on religious beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 況且，過去世界末日的預言往往基於宗教信仰。

sentences.english: They have very high mortality rates. They are sort of the doomsday-scenario bugs.
sentences.chinese: 他們有很高的致死率，他們是那種世界末日病菌。

sentences.english: The problem with doomsday investing is that it's difficult to cash out.
sentences.chinese: 世界末日投資的問題在於很難兌現。

sentences.english: If you screw up, is it the end of the world?
sentences.chinese: 如果你精神失常了，就是世界末日了麼？

sentences.english: It is a list of things I want to do before I die.
sentences.chinese: 世界末日前你唯一想做的事情就是買一堆桶子？

sentences.english: Overconsumption of media can make you feel like the end of the world is quickly approaching.
sentences.chinese: 對媒體的過度消費會使你感覺世界末日很快就要來了。

sentences.english: For the apocalyptically inclined, the answer was obvious.
sentences.chinese: 如果對於世界末日學說，這個答案是顯而易見的。

sentences.english: This could mean the end for me. And it definitely means the end for me and my friend.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說真像世界末日，這意味着我和她將要永別了。

sentences.english: It's like for Paul the blessings of the eschaton, the eschatology,is still horizontal.
sentences.chinese: 就好像，保羅認爲的末世恩惠，世界末日仍在遠處。

sentences.english: And I basically feel this is the end of the world, this is humiliating and everybody notices.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得像世界末日一樣，太丟人了，大家都看到了。

sentences.english: What happened? You look so crestfallen like it's the end of the world!
sentences.chinese: 怎麼了？你看起來垂頭喪氣的，好像世界末日一樣。

sentences.english: When you’re young, everying feels like the end of the world.
sentences.chinese: 當你年輕的時候，所以事都像是世界末日。

sentences.english: These effects are set at bringing a doomsday to the whole of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 這些影響開始給整個人類帶來世界末日。

definition: heaven falls and earth rends (idiom); rocked by a major disaster/fig. violent revolution/major social upheaval
